REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1992 reute r f BC-GOULD-<GLD>-SELLS-FRE 03-26 0052

TEXT.TITLE: GOULD <GLD> SELLS FRENCH BATTERY UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Gould Inc said it sold its French Battery unit, Cie Francaise d'Electro Chimie, to a group of investors including the unit's employees and <GNB Inc> of Minnesota. Terms of the sale were not disclosed. The unit had 1986 sales of 65 mln dlrs. Reuter
